Reviews.Title: Awesome budget laptop
Reviews.Author: AzlanHawke
Reviews.Content: I was looking in the market for a basic laptop for my younger brother who is going off to college (UCI). I'd had search on numerous websites looking for a deal which included newegg, frys, bestbuy, and walmart. All of which were out of my budget which is when I found this baby on amazon. I gotta say, this is the best bang for your buck as far as practically and price. At $315, this machine has exceeded my expectations! I thought it would be a lot smaller and slower both at which were incorrect. Has great hardrive storage and comes with 4 GB ram, I may buy some more ram so that multitasking would be much quicker. Right I can stream online radio, have 4-5 tabs open with different websites loaded (including me writing this review) without it taking to long to load each page but it could be faster with RAM upgrade. Overall, I think my brother will be very pleased with his new laptop, it will take care of his educational needs as well as entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Great for gaming, great all around
Reviews.Author: Cblackwell7594
Reviews.Content: The laptop is perfect in every way- sleek, slim, great graphics, amazing memory, and lightning fast download speed (for a point of reference, it completely downloaded World of Warcraft in three days, which usually takes between four days and a week), and after installing the game, which is usually a huge drain on speed, memory, etc, I noticed no difference in performance. I was told a low end, non-gaming laptop would be awful with games like WoW; my opinion has officially been changed and this is now my new favorite.

Reviews.Title: It's pretty sexy
Reviews.Author: Colin
Reviews.Content: For $300 this is definitelya bargain. I like the smaller screen size than the 15 inch, and thebetter processor. It's still relatively slow (I used to have a mac), but it gets the jobs done. This laptop is a good little guy.I saw that another reviewerposted about the spacebar not always working - it's true, the spacebar doesn't always read. I hate that! It's done it probably five times while writingthis review.Anyway I thinkthat this laptop crushes its competitors. You'renot going tofind much in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: GameFreak
Reviews.Content: Got here fast, Plays minecraft around 30 frames with chrome and sony vegas open. Really good computer for its price! The P button is having a few problems and the touchpad kinda sucks but besides that it is amazing!

Reviews.Title: It's money well spent!
Reviews.Author: Noah
Reviews.Content: I don't like Windows 8 but this laptop is very nice and was worth the money! I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work at all.
Reviews.Author: Khanh Tran
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my girlfriend because she needed one for school. I read the reviews and wasn't really expecting too much for the price, but I was expecting it to at least work. Right out of the box, I put in the battery and I turn it on, but the screen stays black. I figure alright, whatever the battery must be very low, so I turn it off and plug it into the charger for about an hour or two. Try again and it still doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Laptop
Reviews.Author: Talon8Ya
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for my mother who very nervous about learning Windows 8 it turned out to be easier for her to use than her existing Windows 7 desktop.When we first got the system I upgraded it to Win 8.1 immediately.  Once this was done and the rest of Windows updates we were ready to give it a go.First the screen is very nice I was surprised by this as I thought it would be more in line with budget quality screens.  The colors are sharp and bright.  Mom was very easily able to read the screen and test while using her Kindle app was crisp and clear.The speed is very good especially after the Win 8.1 update.Some people have reported problems with the WiFi staying connected and at first we did too.  By turning off the power management setting for the WiFi adapter in the device manager it stopped happening.  Apparently the most current driver that Asus has out does not bring it out of sleep and make it reconnect properly even if the system was in use or asleep.Once I changed the setting no more problem.  Hopefully this will be addressed in a future driver update.  Because the is an easy work around I did not remove a star for this.Battery life on this is excellent she usually get in excess of 6+ hrs of constant use using the internet and working on documents.Adding a SSD in the future will make battery life go even higher and speed up an already quick system.It is very light weight which was very important to mom.The only real con is the touchpad.  It can be a bit finicky until you adjust in the settings to more closely match the way you use it.The shared left and right mouse bar can sometimes feel sloppy.Overall I would recommend this to people looking for a speedy, light weight, fast laptop with a good screen.Tip: definitely get the Windows 8.1 upgrade before doing much with it as it really enhances your windows experience.

Reviews.Title: ASUS
Reviews.Author: Carla Gillespie
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my son. He says it is good for school work but not as good for games.

Reviews.Title: Nice looking laptop
Reviews.Author: Kamilah Coney
Reviews.Content: I love the new Windows 8 look. I can see all my downloads and applications in one place. What I love the best is that it isn't just a list but it also has icons, makes it more visually appealing. I haven't run into any major issues yet. Overall, I love it,

Reviews.Title: Failed laptop
Reviews.Author: William M. Olson
Reviews.Content: We send the laptop back to you. It failed many times, and we talked to a tech specialist on numerous occasions butcould not fix it. Still waiting for our refund.

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth what I pad.
Reviews.Author: Lexington Alexander
Reviews.Content: I spent about $1,000 on my laptop several years ago. This laptop was $300.00 and several times better than what I was using before.I think it got a lot of negative comments, not because of the machine, but because of Windows 8. The first thing that I did was uninstall all of the software that I didn't need. There's a bunch of stuff from ASUS that is preloaded. I also opted out of a lot of Windows 8 tracking stuff. You need to go through custom installation and opt out when you first get your machine.One thing that is really annoying is the combination headphone / microphone jack. You can only use one device at a time. I tried splitting it with a 3.5mm splitter, EVERYTHING. I cannot get a microphone and a speaker to work simultaneously. However, I think if you get a microphone to USB adapter, you could probably get multiple devices to work at the same time. So, THAT has been very annoying.If you play some heavy duty games, the performance might not be great, but casual games are fine. What I REALLY don't like is that I can't read my kindle books on it because they aren't all available for Windows 8.1. I really hope this will be fixed.But if you're just doing normal Windows stuff and projects for school, working from home, etc. You shouldn't have any huge problems once you're set up.That being said. This is a deal! But you're have a few inconveniences for that deal.Also, registering for the warranty through Asus was a nightmare! Finding the serial code is a pain. You have to enter a bunch of information and then your computer doesn't connect to their server for some reason, so go STRAIGHT to their website, and do it there, because the autoplay wizard when you start your machine doesn't work at all.I could see why it is 3 on average, but I give it a 4 now that I've had it for a few months. The hardest part was getting used to Windows 8.

Reviews.Title: Good for its price
Reviews.Author: Juan Pablo Madiedo Zuniga
Reviews.Content: It is a very good Laptop for the price I paid. It is no so fast but you can work on it without any problem.

Reviews.Title: great price.
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: very happy. no disc drive is the only downer but the ext. drivers are cheap and sometimes better than a internal one. but the speed and setup is great. it is a great budget computer. if your low on cash but need a good laptop id get this one.

Reviews.Title: I'd look elsewhere.
Reviews.Author: Randy StClair
Reviews.Content: I do not like this computer. It feels very slow. My recently crashed 8-9 year old HP ran WAAAAY faster. Even to keyboard lags frequently. I have broadband internet and it takes MINUTES to load simple textual web pages like recipes. You have to pound the space bar to get it to work. Windows 8 is the most idiotic system I've ever used. If you are looking for a budget laptop, then you've found it. If you want a faster computer that does what its supposed to, then I'd look elsewhere. I've owned this computer for about 2 weeks now and I'm already shopping for a new HP... Hope your luck is better than mine. AAAHHHHH, this spacebar is frustrating, even more so if you are fast at typing......

Reviews.Title: Not Good for Win 8 - Great for Linux!
Reviews.Author: Alcides Rivarola
Reviews.Content: Just after the 2nd or 3rd time I turn it on the windows begin to froze all the time. I couldn't do anything at all. All the programs were really slow. So as I'm not a great fan of Windows I installed Linux Open Suse on it. It works just fine, smooth with the programs and browsing on Internet.So I will suggest if you are going to use Windows, don't buy it. But if you intend to install Linux on it. Just go ahead.Perhaps, Asus should installs Linux by default on this Laptop.

Reviews.Title: Terribly Slow...
Reviews.Author: Nikki Braaten
Reviews.Content: I got this computer as an upgrade to my old ASUS, which I loved, but alas, is now 4 years old.  The Asus X401U was lighter and smaller, however, it was slower than my 4 year old computer from the second I started it up - and it froze all the time.  I'm NOT a big technology person, and I don't need anything fancy, but this computer was lower quality than a big clonky 4 year old computer.  Save your money....

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Atara
Reviews.Content: This laptop was a good price, but my husband ended up returning it. It felt quite flimsy, and we found the operating system annoying.

Reviews.Title: Has a overheating problem.
Reviews.Author: ShemSwag
Reviews.Content: Bought this laptop but put it through something like Virtual DJ and the whole laptop gets hot. I don't think that this is a laptop that can be able to do hardcore things but if you want a laptop that sticks to the basics, this is the one for you. Just don't overwork it.

Reviews.Title: laptop difficult to use
Reviews.Author: craigbauer
Reviews.Content: not reliable.windows 8 very hard to work with.cursor pad uncomfortable to use cursor moves when pressing on pad if not careful.

Reviews.Title: I got this for my daugther for school
Reviews.Author: sheila miller
Reviews.Content: The laptop works exactly as described. My daughter would have liked 8g, for more storage space. But we bought zip drive and that corrected her storage issue.

Reviews.Title: very good purchase
Reviews.Author: León
Reviews.Content: it is not heavy, is fast and nice sized.i choose this because of the price and the size and i get what i buy!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for home use
Reviews.Author: c-chavez
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a present to my mother and it's perfect for what she uses. It is fast, and has the perfect Processor/RAM/Storage balance for home use. If you want to play powerful games or anything alike, I recommend buying an extra video card.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Ana K.
Reviews.Content: Just like tha picture, amazing, I LOVE IT , I USED every day its fast HD, GORGEOUSSS, i whatch movies whit the HD cable in my tv always  ( ESpectacular, lo recomiendo hermoso, veo peliculas siempre en mi televisor descargadas por la laptos es genial HD rapida tal cual la foto, quede super conforme)

Reviews.Title: Wish it was faster
Reviews.Author: Jeanette B. Lucas
Reviews.Content: It is light weight. Windows 8 is a challenge, but that is a different issue. I should have upgraded to a faster processor.I like the machine. It is to carry with me to work on the road.

Reviews.Title: not what i expected
Reviews.Author: wendy wolstenholme
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for christmas to use for college.  it does not have the basic microsoft words so i had to add it ..windows 8 is for touch screen use,  this is not touch screen but is  set up like it is .  It was tough for her to get use to but she has mastered it.

Reviews.Title: Budget Laptop
Reviews.Author: Joanna Liu
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my dad when his old laptop dead. This computer is a bit slow, but it is very cheap. So if you are on a budget, this is not a bad choice.Cons:- Not a touchscreen (Windows 8 is really not designed for non-touchscreens), but again at this price, I was clear what I am getting.- Wifi is somewhat unstable, it took quite long to find my home wifi. It showed all my neighbor's wifi except mine. My other laptop had no problem finding it. After 30 min of various problem solving, it finally showed up on its own. No idea why did it do that at all.- A little bit slow compare to my other laptop that has the same feature (500GB/4GB Ram)- Smart Gesture pad is reacting very slow. A lot of time it only started to work after a few minutes after startup.- Bulky charger.

Reviews.Title: EFFICIENT
Reviews.Author: Erastus
Reviews.Content: ITS COOL FOR ITS PRICE I DO NOT HAVE ANY REGRETS WHATSOEVER SO FAR FOR PURCHASING THIS SYSTEM I WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE WHO WANTS SOMETHING REASONABLE

Reviews.Title: Very nice laptop
Reviews.Author: TL
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best choices for buying a computer that I have made. The laptop utility goes above and beyond its price.

Reviews.Title: Pretty much as expected
Reviews.Author: Dale Lawson
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 is mostly a disappointment coming from Windows 7, but that's not anything to do with the machine itself. The machine is slow, but the price is right. Don't expect a lot of power from this, but it's lightweight and gets simple tasks done. Certainly not a gaming machine unless you're using it for retro games as the graphics processor isn't powerful enough to render anything 3D. For the price you get a decent machine if you're reluctant to join the tablet fad. Worth every penny as far as I'm concerned. Very satisfied, even if it's a bit slow.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Shelley D Terrell, Author of Rag Dolls: Calli...
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my son. He has not put it down since he opened it. It is the perfect computer for a child.

Reviews.Title: very well
Reviews.Author: JEAN CARLOS SERRANO
Reviews.Content: Team vini in good condition, in box with all accessories, funcionana great software and different elements. only the left edge of the screen has a thick white line ... manufacturing defect appears

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Richard Pabon
Reviews.Content: perfect lap top  that i bought for my sister. Works wonderful and good lasting battery life. Will recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Good for a teenager
Reviews.Author: Nancy A. Hankel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 14 year old.  It was exactly what he needed to play games, do school work and surf the web.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: jung-soo kim
Reviews.Content: A little noisy and slow.But it was a reasonable purchase considering price.Surface is not stain-proof so frequent wipeout needed.

Reviews.Title: Asus 14" laptop
Reviews.Author: Aleene Varnadoe
Reviews.Content: Light weight and easy to carry, given to my granddaughter for her school work and she loves it. supplies all her needs

Reviews.Title: It's great at this price!!
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: This computer is lightweight.  It's great for email, web surfing,  picture storage, etc.. I would highly recommend this computer for everyday simple use.

Reviews.Title: Glitchy. Keeps Freezing and slow
Reviews.Author: J A - San Jose, CA
Reviews.Content: We bought this at Best Buy because it was cheaper there. Only $270++Day 1 Install Day -> Easy to set up. Glitch #1 happened. Wifi lost connection and would not create the outlook account but still got to complete setup.  -> completed all windows update required. Took a while and a number of restarts but that was to be expected.  -> Day 1. 3x lost wifi connection. Had to click on the "FIX THIS.. " button to get it resolved.Day 2 -> installed office, adobe, no issues on install.  Lost Wifi connection once.Day 3 -> Mouse pointer keeps freezing. Had to force reboot 2x.I should have taken the best buy reviews more seriously. A lot of people angry with their purchase.A lot of issues with this computer:1.  Mouse pointer freezing2.  Webpages take 3-5 seconds to render completely and mouse pointer active for navigation3.  Free 30 day Mcafee will not scan. Keeps shutting off.4.  Have to click on things 3-5 times for it to respond.5.  Space bar doesnt respond all the time so have to double click on it sometimesLikes:1.  Lightweight2.  Pricei think the cons outweigh the pros. Will be returning to best buyupdate:Day 5i figured out the issue with the mouse pointer freezing, apparently after it did multiple updates, it disabled the mouse. I have never seen this before but there is a function key that has a mouse icon on it with a line on it. just clicking that function key returns the mouse pointer.Decided to give it a couple more days to see if all the windows update fixes its issues.Day 6seriously... i think weve experienced about 10 updates and about 15 restarts since then. how many windows update do you need? Some go for an hour. so today we disabled the automatic updates feature and maybe will enable updates when we leave the laptop at home.Speed has not changed. for yahoo main page, about 5 seconds to render fully. for netflix main page, about 30 seconds to render fully. Once they render, they stay usable. no issues. so if you are patient and not willing to spend a little more, this one is for you.

Reviews.Title: My asus laptop I bought brand new barely 3 weeks ago is a lemon!
Reviews.Author: Deidre
Reviews.Content: This laptop has given me lots of problems! I've had it barely 3 weeks and it totally went black on me tonight for about a half an hour! The mouse freezes, it flashes from one thing to another while I'm typing an email or looking up something online! This laptop is a lemon! I'm sending it back tomorrow to exchange it for another one that might work right! If it doesn't I'm getting a different laptop! I'm not impressed!!!! Buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: Asus Laptop
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Harold
Reviews.Content: I think it's a good enough laptop, the first download that I would assume should take an hour, took 10 hours. It's working fine. Just slow.

Reviews.Title: Super Cheap - Very Practical!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth C. Crow
Reviews.Content: I cannot believe the value in this notebook! I use it in class and it does everything required by the University in their standards for computing. It came with Windows 8 and I am glad to be learning it, but have to admit I often quick key to the desktop - a more familiar environment.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: trinidad
Reviews.Content: At first I found it to be a bit slow, however after a while it began responding faster and now its great. I've had it just under two weeks now.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I needed a computer because my ipad can only do so much so this laptop fills those roles. Shipping was on tine and packed well. The laptop turned right on and was easy to set up. I will agree with other reviews that the speed isn't instant. But I feel the price is good and you get a lot. I gave it 4 stars but I love it and happy I got it.

Reviews.Title: cheap for sure
Reviews.Author: darin
Reviews.Content: its not the greatest laptop I have ever bought,, I bought it for my young son to use... you get what you pay for.. its a 350.00 laptop

Reviews.Title: Worthful deal
Reviews.Author: Xiao Mei
Reviews.Content: It's a gift for my niece, looks very nice and weighs very light. Hope she likes it. The white one might be nicer.

Reviews.Title: Good Computer
Reviews.Author: Esther H. Dorsey
Reviews.Content: Good productDidn't know it did not have have DVD drive, missed the small printCompared to other similar products was a good price

Reviews.Title: WOW...
Reviews.Author: S Carolina
Reviews.Content: Hands-Down this Lap-Top is the Best Bang for the Dollar, it's everything you need and WOW, it was delivered Fast......

Reviews.Title: Decent little computer...
Reviews.Author: kja926
Reviews.Content: One con I will state right off, is that there is no disc drive.  There are no pictures or anything in the description to indicate that, and if I didn't need this computer for school (because my other had died) I probably would have shipped it back.Otherwise, this computer is good.  It's pretty fast and can handle many programs open at once. I do not understand the Instant On program from Asus though and do not know why these computer companies feel the need to add preloaded stuff to computers. It just slows them down in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: There was some problems, but now everything is going flawlesly.
Reviews.Author: Angga Pratama
Reviews.Content: It was working very slow once. I don't know the problem, also I couldn't update my windows before and I couldn't format my PC. But I solved the problem already with deleting all the data those I had. May be there were viruses on my PC. And now so far so good. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic machine for the price
Reviews.Author: Damon Amyx
Reviews.Content: This machine was my first introduction to Windows 8. I'm still getting a feel for it. I find it curious that there's a convergence in the software-distribution model on all the major operating systems: W8, iOS, and Android.This little guy weighs almost nothing, takes up almost no space, has a great battery life, can run all the applications I've tested so far without any trouble, and its GPU can handle running an external 24" monitor. It's highly functional, highly mobile, and for less than $300, it's a fabulous deal.My only real complaints are three: (1) no bluetooth (see more at *** below); (2) only three USB ports; and (3) the fans run quite loudly even when the machine is idling and both the laptop screen and the external monitor are turned off. Nonetheless, after roughly six weeks of ownership, I remain quite pleased with my purchase. By and large, it knocks the socks off a 13.3" ASUS I bought two years ago for more than twice the price of the X401U.--EDIT, 2014.02.21: Although the GPU *can* handle most graphic loads on a dual-monitor display, such a setup seems to put the GPU pretty hard and leave it running pretty hot. I've had issues with streaming video (including here on Amazon, as well as YouTube and other sites) where the hardware buffering and processing just can't quite cut it and video displays as anywhere from slightly choppy to devolving into unwatchable, disjointed frames.Still, this is a great $300 laptop with exceptional performance for a machine in its price range. Even if it's not ideal for graphics development or hardcore gaming, it does that vast majority of what I want it to.*** The lack of bluetooth support is more of an issue (at least for me) than I'd initially found it to be or thought it would be; bluetooth devices continue to gain in popularity, the mere 3 USB slots that this machine comes with just don't cut it. Fortunately, multi-port splitters are readily available, such as Black 4-Port High Speed USB 2.0 Hub (about $5) and 7 Port USB Squid Hub (also about $5 as of this review date).

Reviews.Title: My ASUS Laptop
Reviews.Author: Velda G. Myles
Reviews.Content: My laptop delivers. I love everything about it and what a great price! It has everything I need to do my homework and download music. I also have a camera and camcorder built in. Awesome!

Reviews.Title: I FREAKING LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Orlando Javier Blanco Raffe
Reviews.Content: I LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS LAPTOP ALTHOUGH IS REALLY HARD TO HANDLE WINDOWS 8 SINCE I AM USED TO WINDOWS 7 OR XP

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop
Reviews.Author: Joseph Nunes
Reviews.Content: Decent system for the price.  I was surprised by the crisp video.  Using this mostly to surf the web and Facebook.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: not the big deal for the price
Reviews.Author: jairo reynoso m
Reviews.Content: when i read the specs of this labtop i like it.but later through investigations with the brandmaker i found out that the memory of this labtop cannot be replaced in case of damage.so beg god it does not happen.i also think this labtop is very weak i mean not made of sturdy material,the hinge is very fragile.this is my first labtop.i was able to buy a labtop more expensive than this but because of the spec i decided this one.the labtop is not that slow but not that fast either.considering that it has a dual core and a ddr3 memory of three gb.maybe im asking to much because im a programmer or maybe Windows 8 is so heavy that this labtop cannot perfomance that well because of it.im not that happy with this labtop.i will try to get the most out of this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Garret Rushforth
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying this purchase immensely! It was a great buy. Meets or exceeds all expectations. Overall, it's been fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Not a happy Amazon user.
Reviews.Author: Eileen Malter
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed in the product.  My daughter bought me the same item but with extras included in the price, e.g. cover, mouse, and flash drive.  I returned the product hoping to receive a FULL REFUND - but I am missing $68.00.  How come???  I returned it within the required time but did not get my full refund.I am VERY VERY UPSET.,Eileen Malter

Reviews.Title: Screen broke after a few days of use
Reviews.Author: Adam Weber
Reviews.Content: After a just three days of use, the screen cracked around the edges. The laptop was kept in a protective carry case and never exposed to stress that should have caused this kind of damage, especially considering the previous occupant of that case had no trouble for years in it.

Reviews.Title: Good computer but a pain in the neck OS
Reviews.Author: Jhonatan Z.
Reviews.Content: It's a good computer, but windows 8.1 has its issues. For example, you will have problems with the brightness not lowing down or with your inability to watch videos. But you can look for the solution on the net. Once you learn about it, windows 8.1 is nice.

Reviews.Title: This is an absolutely terrrible laptop
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Hideously slow, will not even play basic youtube video's smoothly.  The machine is stripped down, just win 8 and avast, nothing else on it.

Reviews.Title: Disapointment
Reviews.Author: Sandy Jalinski
Reviews.Content: The Laptop did not work from date received now we have more expense to ship it back and if not under warranty we need to pay.  I think it is a rotten deal.  I'm trying to help out a friend and just caused her a lot more problems.  She has been on the phone with costumer service from Asus and has to send it back.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed, going back
Reviews.Author: Marc Olevin
Reviews.Content: this is going back, the keyboard failed in the first 2-3 weeks...i'd have returned it already but it is being used daily in a stage play and we can't take it offline til we can transfer all the data and programs to another system (it's running a complex powerpoint slide show that was programmed prior to keyboard failure, but cannot even use the spacebar as the "go" key, need to use other less efficient touchpad key, working ok for that, barely, but just to log on everyday we need to plug in an separate external keyboard) ... also it seems flimsy and cheap build (maybe that's why keyboard went down) and just not reliable ... i've owned two prior Dell notebooks and they're still working great, sorry i didn't use one of those for this show ... i'll update this review once i get it back from the play and see how Asus/Amazon handles the problem

Reviews.Title: Great aside from the minor flaws.
Reviews.Author: Kyle Hough
Reviews.Content: The spacebar must be touched in the middle to work, the left and right side do not activate the spacebar. Also the Audio is not as loud as I'd like it.

Reviews.Title: not what i expected
Reviews.Author: sherlan
Reviews.Content: system is ok for its price but the operating system could be better ,not really a fan of win 8

Reviews.Title: Doing okay so far
Reviews.Author: R. Clarke
Reviews.Content: To put it into context - I work from home so my requirements are a bit different. A good little machine. Good hard disk space. Good loading boot time. Good graphics, okay speakers for machine. Connectivity a bit slow but I will get used to that. The keyboard is still a bit sticky as if they have not been "broken in". Never went through that before. Still navigating my way around Windows 8. Such a pain to be going through a learning curve again.  The machine is very light and loaded with good features to make your navigation a breeze. I am not very fond of the updated versions of the work tools such as skype and MS Office.  All in all decent.

Reviews.Title: Supppah Slow :(
Reviews.Author: Hederson
Reviews.Content: Takes for ever to upload everything... Too slow of a processer. Wish It wasnt so slow. The external part is nice and fancy but the internal hardwear and softwear is bad.

Reviews.Title: returned
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This laptop wasn't fast enough at loading web pages. It was just too slow at doing everything. I returned it to get something faster.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: Carlos Mancebo "Caramand"
Reviews.Content: This the worst computer I've ever had. Too slow, it gets frozen just trying to write anything. Oh yes it has 4gb RAM and 500GB hard drive, but for what? Its processor is too weak for all the programs it brings, especially windows 8. It's been a total disappointment. I've been Amazon's customer for more than ten years and this is the first time I buy something this bad. It's a lovely piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Patterson
Reviews.Content: For $300 I was expecting it to be a bit slow but this just sinks into the void.It freezes constantly, some days it seems to speed up (which is rare) until the next session when it's slower than ever.bit of advice is to spend $100-$200 extra for a better, more reliable one

Reviews.Title: not a good notebook
Reviews.Author: carol
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed in the product.  The software was not properly loaded and never worked well.  I contacted seller who told me to contact computer company.  I tried several times and could not get them to repair software conflicts.  I even wiped out and stared again with factory settings and still same issues.  Remember to read fine print as it is nonreturnable once it has been used. I do not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8.1
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Smolic
Reviews.Content: The only bad thing about this computer is that it automatically comes with Windows 8.1.  I do not like this program and prefer windows 7 or even Windows XP.  Very unhappy with the software and just might have to spend money I don't have to "downgrade" the computer.  Other than that, I am very please with the service, shipping and the timely manner it arrived.  Thank you Amazon for the service.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy an ASUS laptop
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: The hinge mechanism is faulty workmanship. I bought the laptop in August 2013. The hinge broke and because it is molded to the LCD, ASUS is expecting me to pay $165 as well as shipping ($30.00) for the repair. ASUS will not stand by its warranty even though the hinge initially broke after my owning it only 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: slow
Reviews.Author: cinderella9223
Reviews.Content: Love the size and weight but its so slow. It's almost 2014 can't believe they make slow laptops. Going to return it. So hard to find a 14" light weight that isn't slow without spending over $600.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: slynn
Reviews.Content: It is really nice It is decent for working on things. If you have papers to type or things to do you will want this. If you ever considered a gaming laptop this one can handle games just not super high render like minecraft this one has got it for minecraft for ya.

Reviews.Title: Very problematic laptop
Reviews.Author: Mallory michaelis
Reviews.Content: Many issues with this laptop!! I've had problems within the first two times of using it. Battery life is terrible. Screen often goes black. Keys are sticking. Internet connection is extremely slow.

Reviews.Title: So underpowered it's not even funny!
Reviews.Author: Peter V
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this.  You'll immediately be underwhelmed by the power.  It was so slow that I had to send it back.  And that's given the fact that I knew it would be slow.  I had low expectations for speed and was still underwhelmed.  Maybe it would run Windows XP alright, or maybe Windows 95, but not Windows 8.  Aweful...

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: maria angelica valles rodriguez
Reviews.Content: very good and cute perfect weight and large ajustable for me very confortable and color increible, i like it soo much

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Daughter of Eve "Praising God for this audio ...
Reviews.Content: Don't waist your money. My daughter hardly got to use this laptop and it just keep freezing and making hours long updates every time she tries to turn it on. Too bad I have to designate one star for the system to acknowledge my poor review.

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend. Too slow.
Reviews.Author: Eliot Cobb
Reviews.Content: This asus computer is one the worst computers I have purchased. I usually buy Dell but I picked this because of price. Guess I will go back to Dell. It is very slow. If you're a big user (like me) definitely don't buy this. If you're a light user this may work. One big problem is the speed of the processor, too slow. If only pay $300, you're going to get a substandard processor. Another problem is the RAM which is only 4gb. If you're using windows 8 you'll need a RAM of at least 6gb, preferably more. I would not recommend this computer. And I probably will not buy Asus again. I just can't take the chance. the bottom line: you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: bad laptop..was of time and money
Reviews.Author: davidh@google.com
Reviews.Content: does not work properly,when it does its very slow and doesn't connect to goggle chrome, .often can't use at all and forced to use cell phone not satisfied at all...at any price...

Reviews.Title: laptop had a trogan hourse on it4 days before iordered it
Reviews.Author: boots1263
Reviews.Content: it cost me 179 to  have it  removed first time it shows up in my history on dec 5th I ordered it on the 9th and got internet axis on the 12th if I did not need it I would have sent it back because I already complained the battery only locks on one side i am mad at myself because I could have gotten a cheaper model but thought if I paid more it would be better quality I was wrong

Reviews.Title: This is a microsoft notebook computer
Reviews.Author: Debbie Lampert
Reviews.Content: I bought this notebook computer because it was both light weight and light on my pocketbook. One of the reasons for this is that the product does not have a cd/dvd drive - one of its selling points. Because it is light weight I can carry it with me to business meetings and if I want to relocate myself from my office to a coffee shop I can take it easily.  I bought this  notebook to replace my Apple Macbook Air, which is gorgeous equipment, very light but very expensive. The Asus is nowhere near as sexy as the Apple product. I was also disappointed because this is a  Microsoft notebook computer. I did not realize that when I bought it. On the Asus you are too tied into the microsoft world. Each time you fire up you have to enter your Microsoft password and the defaults are always Microsoft defaults. Who needs that.  Still, in terms of price performance I got a good deal. But my old mac is so nice, it is hard for me to wean myself to this new spiffy tool.
